summary: Comprehensive testing of Dark Realms 2D action-platformer game completed successfully. All core functionality including backend APIs, frontend UI, character creation, level progression, shop system, and Phaser.js game engine integration working perfectly.
passed_tests: Main menu loads with DARK REALMS title and buttons
Character selection shows all 7 classes with proper stats
Character creation flow with name input
Level select screen with gold/kills display
Shop interface with equipment slots and inventory
Game screen with Phaser.js canvas rendering

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI flows and Phaser.js game integration working)
